TDR for EU Shippers

End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for EU Shippers

Unlock hidden savings in your eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.

A Solution For Each Customs Duty Spend

Order Shipped

The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.

Order Returned

The order was delivered to its US buyer. One or more items are returned.

Claim back US duties with our innovative TDR US Duty Drawback solution.

Order re-imported in the EU

The order is now back to the EU, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.

TDR Duty-Free Returns to Europe will get your goods back home at 0% Duties.
